name: Memes Collector
description:
◉ Go hunt for rare memes.
◉ This is just pure fun! All you have to do is to tap on a little button at the bottom of screen and wait for few seconds ... and ... bam! A meme pops out and goes in to your inventory.
◉ Prepare yourself for surprises, because memes come in 5 degrees of rarity: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Very Rare and Extremely Rare.
◉ There are tons more of fun elements and contents awaiting our team to implement in future updates. We also want to hear from you whatever you come up with to make Meme Collector better!

Just tap and collect them all!
Thanks for stopping by. Hope you'll enjoy the game ;)
